description:
Captain of the Luzianna Militia`s Suicide Squad. The Suicide Squad is a group of skilled soldiers who pilot Luzianna`s prized MS-06 Bojarnon (these are in fact salvaged MS-05 Zaku I and MS-06 Zaku II units). Gavane is well-liked by his men and very proud of his squadron. He develops feelings for Sochie Heim and tries to protect her even though he respects her skills as a warrior.
The pair become engaged in spite of Sochie`s lingering feelings for Loran, but Gavane is killed before they can be married.
name: Gavane Goonny
